price: 51. Markaasaa waxaa ku dhacay xumaanta waxay kasbadeen; oo kuwaa fala dulmiga ee ka mid ah kuwani waxaa iyagana ku dhici doona xumaanta waxay kasbadaan, mana baxsan karaan10.
arabic: فَأَصَابَهُمۡ سَيِّـَٔاتُ مَا كَسَبُواْۚ وَٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ مِنۡ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ سَيُصِيبُهُمۡ سَيِّـَٔاتُ مَا كَسَبُواْ وَمَا هُم بِمُعۡجِزِينَ
footnotes: 10. Macnaha waa ma karaan inay ka joojiyaan Allaah inuu falo waxa uu doono ama inay ka fakadaan Ciqaabkiisa.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fa-aṣābahum sayyiātu mā kasabū wa-alladhīna ẓalamū min hāulāi sayuṣībuhum sayyiātu mā kasabū wamā hum bimuʿ'jizīna
